Public Interface IMutableComplexType Implements IMutableTypeBase, IReadOnlyComplexType
type IMutableComplexType = interface interface IReadOnlyComplexType interface IReadOnlyTypeBase interface IReadOnlyAnnotatable interface IMutableTypeBase interface IMutableAnnotatable

Docs.summary: Represents the type of a complex property of a structural type.

remarks.para: This interface is used during model creation and allows the metadata to be modified. Once the model is built, represents a read-only view of the same metadata.
See Modeling entity types and relationships for more information and examples.

Docs.summary: Gets the root base type for a given complex type.
Docs.returns: The root base type. If the given complex type is not a derived type, then the same complex type is returned.
